website_summaries.verdict: A popular go-to for firming chin, jaw, neck, and décolletage.
pros: Contains omega 3, 6, and 9 to minimize fine lines, wrinkles, and sagging skin
Helps even out tone and repair sun damaged areas
cons: Some say it has a fishy undercurrent to the scent

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.text: I was watching a paid TV ad commercial on the miraculous improvement of using this on your neck area to reduce sags and wrinkles so I purchased this product about a month ago and have been using it daily. I can not see any change in that area at all. Do not waste your money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S

customer_reviews.title: Little to no difference and I used several Perricone products ...
customer_reviews.text: Little to no difference and I used several Perricone products and eventually spent 2-3 thousand dollars overall and was NOT pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can not say anything bad on perricone
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I can not say anything bad on perricone , love been using it for about 6 years, I love it, i see such a difference in my skin, I think that your creams target the aged skin, (and I want to say that in the nicest way) but alot of creams are for the young face,.. perricone is for the older skin with wrinkles, which I have and I see a difference, thank you, Dr.Perricone, I will never stop using your creams Thank you Martha Ames
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Product I received was a year out of date.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy W.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a Perricone product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Perricone products for several years and never had a reaction to any of them. Unfortunately, I attempted to save some money and buy from Amazon. The product arrived neatly packaged but the jar was suspiciously tall. I used the product once and it caused a rash.
customer_reviews.author: Crisscross

customer_reviews.title: Age Ain't Noth'n but A Number
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my neckline and facial contour. At 73, I noticed the results fairly quickly...my skin loves it. As far as contouring, it's too soon to say.
customer_reviews.author: Innovativejo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Haven't noticed any change. I've been using it for over 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Not seeing the results in the timest they claim, and my neck is not that bad. May or may not order again. Undecided.
customer_reviews.author: Contessa

customer_reviews.title: Good For Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: A good, medium weight cream that absorbs in and goes on smoothly. It doesn't lift the skin really, but, it is a high quality moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: BeeMama

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Made no difference and it is very expensive. It made me break out on my neck and chest area and it smells terrible. I wish I knew this before I would never have purchased it and I do not recommend it I had to give it one star
customer_reviews.author: Elaine S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this product!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this product! it smells awful, and hasn't done anything to my neck... It's overpriced, I've tried other products with better results. I would never buy Perricone again. I'll stick to my usual brand. I'm also thinking, that what the seller sent me was an old product, consequently it lost it's effectiveness...
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: This product seems to be working but halfway through my ...
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be working but halfway through my 135$ product and I can't stand behind it enoigh to say it is worth a refill. Just not seeing much of a difference and i'm only 28 w very minimal lines on my forehead and neck that are still there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smell like fish
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to tell yet however, I was concerned about the fish smell that many reported. I smell nothing close to fish. I’m almost concerned I got a jar that isn’t potent after reading the reviews. I prepared myself for the smell at it has just a faint light smell but nothing like fish.
customer_reviews.author: Iluv2shop

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money on this one. Doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Made my neck worse....
customer_reviews.text: I would give this -minus 5 stars if I could. Did absolutely nothing and in fact made my neck itchy after every application and for me my neck actually got more saggy after a complete application of 2 more then months. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Unsatisfactory product it does nothing the way it was advertised
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Cannaday

customer_reviews.title: Not too greasy.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for neck region, but need to use consistently.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn powell

customer_reviews.title: A product that works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It really transforms the subdermal layer of the skin on my neck, reducing the noticeability of lines. Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy & Chic

customer_reviews.title: Not helping sagging
customer_reviews.text: This does well for moisturizing my neck, the "fish " smell is there but disappears quickly and this product does nothing to help sagging.
customer_reviews.author: Gompers

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I still have my loose skin double chin even with weight loss but can tell my skin looks brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fortune

customer_reviews.title: no response from seller
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a try and it caused a rash on my neck after usage. i had to go to dermatologist to fix it. I tried returning unused portion and didn't receive a response. I really wanted to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: youth... that's the ticket!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for two weeks and don' t see much change but on the other hand, i'm old and expect a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Celia Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Love this procduct.
customer_reviews.text: It really works! I only use it at night, because I don't love the smell but i noticed results in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Dombrowski

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think this was working but when I stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this was working but when I stopped using it I realized that it definitely was. It's not dramatic but there is a difference and I won't be without it.
customer_reviews.author: kimmie d

customer_reviews.title: Big Price Increase!
customer_reviews.text: Could it be that there is a $20.00 price increase since July (5 months ago)! Will not be buying bc the product is good but not THAT good.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I've read so much about this product and many rave reviews. I've been using the cream since Christmas with very little result. I purchased to help with my crepey neck skin. Doesn't seem to be working. Not worth the cost. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeLover

customer_reviews.title: Perricone a great product
customer_reviews.text: I love Perricone products. It keeps my rosacea under control.
customer_reviews.author: Deledim

customer_reviews.title: I can no longer return product
customer_reviews.text: Afterbusing product for 8 weeks I started itching and went to the ER.I can no longer use and Iam pass the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I can tell a difference already
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money. It does not produce the improvement as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I am sad to say that this product does not work. I used it as directed and noticed no change at all. It is expensive and I was really hoping for some improvement. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Maliglig

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: Have used everyday for months and haven’t noticed a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Droddy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells AWFUL........
customer_reviews.text: Would have loved to have tried but seriously could not get past the horrible smell.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Kreofsky

customer_reviews.title: The jar came with less than half of the product
customer_reviews.text: I just open my perricone cream and the jar is half empty
customer_reviews.author: Arturo

customer_reviews.title: Love , love  love this
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using this for a while and started seeing a big difference, so i want right back on it. It really works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not notice difference I digging neck skin after two months use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Burned my skin and gave me rash
customer_reviews.text: It actually burned my skin and gave me a rash ..cannot use was hoping it really worked!!
customer_reviews.author: ellen cutler

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with results so far. Will continue to use until jar is finished but will return to my previous cream.
customer_reviews.author: dorothyadams

customer_reviews.title: I can see the difference!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping, it was in a really cute gift bag. The jar was absolutely unopened in a original packaging. It is really important to me! I started to use this product 3 weeks ago. I am in my early 30s., but I had a small horizontal neck line. I think, it looks a little bit smoother. My first jar (30ml.) is almost finish, because I love using it a lot (for the faster or better result). So, I decided to order my second and bigger jar. Let's see!
customer_reviews.author: The Incredible Hooks

customer_reviews.title: This product smells like the inside of a fishing boat—that you are supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: This product smells like the inside of a fishing boat—that you are supposed to put on your face. I’ve used some of the most expensive products out there—it doesn’t matter if this one works—unless your family is into you smelling like fish. Do not buy this product. Another alternative from this line is the face finishing moisturizer...much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Brooke Haymond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works nice. I see results. I'm about 3/4 through the jar now.
customer_reviews.author: Steamboat927

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't see a diference at all. I am waiting for next month to see what happen.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it may work in the long run. but bare minerals neck firm works much more quickly
customer_reviews.author: cheri kushner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed on the results I am seeing. It's now been over 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia E Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: When applying to the chin area it makes the saliva glands start working. A product that does that doesn't seem save to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do like the product. It smells nice and feels very good.
customer_reviews.author: MizB

customer_reviews.title: Iffy results - strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Half a jar down and I can't tell any difference in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The smell was ok at first, but now its starting to bother me. Much cheaper product from the drug store, like L'Oreal face/neck cream works just as well if not better.
customer_reviews.author: starbuk02

customer_reviews.title: Can't say LOVE it or HATE it
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second jar , was hoping for better results as I saw on the pics posted about this wonder plasma , well !! it does firm a little , but the price does not make it worth while.
customer_reviews.author: Very Picky

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed with the way my neck looked and felt after ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product once. I was amazed with the way my neck looked and felt after one week. I then decided to put it away, and I used another product that I really loved and was pretty satisfied with. However, after using Cold Plasma Sub-D, I decided to give it another try to make sure that this was the best product. This time, I am sure that this is the best product for a "saggy neck", loose skin on the neck, and overall neck care. However, this is product is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: LRS

customer_reviews.title: Minor mishap
customer_reviews.text: Lid was broken when arrived but I was able to salvage most of the product into a different container.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Neck Cream
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough great things of this amazing neck cream. It not only firms up, but the lines disappear within 2 weeks of consistent use. The word here is consistent. You can only see results with a product like this if you are diligent with your morning and night application...it makes a major difference. I have no desire to have any type of lift on my neck or face so products like this rate high on my list of excellent products that work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crack found on bottom of jar
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt figure out why the jar kept feeling greasy on the bottom of my new product know-matter how many time I wiped the jar after each use, I then noticed a crack in the bottom. I have not used it sense because Im afraid this could potentially have introduced some bacteria into the product. I paid alot of money for this, Im sure it is not a common occurance, but it happens
customer_reviews.author: R. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing !!! My neck looks so much younger.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Balesteri

customer_reviews.title: Did what is says
customer_reviews.text: It worked quite well and I did love it however I just can't keep buying it because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this Product. It does what it says it can do. Can't go without it.
customer_reviews.author: margo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product - exceptional delivery time. I'll always buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Kay A

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't work the way I will expected for the money that you paid for
customer_reviews.author: Lilibeth Brall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I feel young by the minute & it costed less than other vendors.
customer_reviews.author: David Guzyk

customer_reviews.title: It can work. It doesn't happen overnight.
customer_reviews.text: I had great success with this product. It really did reduce the pouch under my jaw and chin. The secret is to keep using it. It took 5 or 6 months before I noticed any improvement and up to a year for the best results. I only used it once a day and not a lot of product. Yes, it does smell but persistence is the key. My only complaint is now that my neckline looks better because the size has been reduced is that my skin is very crepey looking. A good moisturizer helps.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Buccola

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: The product has a bad smell. I am not impressed with the product and see no significant improvement. Overall, I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Villar

customer_reviews.title: A great tool to help turn back time
customer_reviews.text: A great tool to help turn back time. The first neck cream that has actually worked. Dr Perricone products produce great results.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: I hope it's good..
customer_reviews.text: I don't know yet about results. It's new to me
customer_reviews.author: Daniele Collignon

customer_reviews.title: Perricone MC Cold Plasma Sub-D
customer_reviews.text: Perricone MD Cold Plasma Sub-D I like this product. It does seem to help my neck look more moisturized, I like the texture and the smell. I'm not crazy about the cost but I only use it at night and not twice a day. I'll continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Walter VonGunten

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works.
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I just use it every day. My neckline looks much younger. It does take 6-8 weeks to really notice the difference. My skin looks smoother and my double chin is much less noticable.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: a lot of hype!
customer_reviews.text: I've read a good number of reviews before I bought this expensive bottle of neck cream; unfortunately, I don't see any obvious advantage this Cold Plasma Sub-D cream has over the Oil of Olay night firming cream which costs ca.15% of this expensive cream. Also, I waited too long, & missed the refund period. :(
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: heard so many great things about this liking it so far
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jo O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: turkey neck cure
customer_reviews.text: unlike other reviews, it smells very good. no offensive odor. I haven't used it long enough to tell if it is working.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ann

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a rash!
customer_reviews.text: The product gave me a rash. I hate that I paid all of that money for this product and now I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Xquizitestillettos

customer_reviews.title: seems to be working!
customer_reviews.text: It has only been 2 weeks, and I am already seeing a firmer neck. I am quite happy after having tried other products that do not work.
customer_reviews.author: adoree

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different products. This stuff is amazing. I am 40 and haven't seen my jaw line in 5 years. Surgery wouldn't have made the difference this product and his line have done on my face. I look like I'm in my 20's again. Really - no joke - it is amazing. I figured I would spend $100 / day on looking this good again. It is totally worth the cost. Plus you use so little it goes a really long way. I will use these products as long as they are available. Hopefully for ever...
customer_reviews.author: E. Kepner

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Also, the bottle was missing the internal safety seal that every Perricone product has!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paint

customer_reviews.title: Quality and affordability
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredible! Love it! I’m 55 years old. However I went to purchase this product on amazon the month before and it was half the price I paid for it the following months! So I had to buy in bulk before you jacked up the prices again!! Not nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Aida Perez Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really work - bottom line
customer_reviews.text: Well, first, it comes in a jar - which means the ingredients won't sustain, and are a breeding ground for bacteria (should be a pump, opaque container). I kept it in the fridge to make sure it stayed relatively fresh. Used twice a day, and it honestly looks worse than before I started, and I have to go back to what I was using before. Also, it has a fishy odor. Sorry I spent the money. Not worth the hype or the empty promise. In addition, the third party seller for Amazon does not have a satisfaction guarantee, so if you use the product, there is no refund.
customer_reviews.author: M. Frastley

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years. I swear it has reduced the sagging & wrinkling on my chest & neck. It does help with consistent use.
customer_reviews.author: MK :-)

customer_reviews.title: Probably not real
customer_reviews.text: This product is not sealed. There is no way to determine if it’s authentic or not and it appears to be already opened. It has a piece of scotch tape on the top.
customer_reviews.author: DmG78

customer_reviews.title: seems to improve after a few weeks. I will ...
customer_reviews.text: seems to improve after a few weeks. I will continue to use for a couple months. So far I think it has improved my neck area
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Pericone MD products are wonderful products and I've used otherPericone products and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Pericone MD products are wonderful products and I've used otherPericone products and they are all good. I really like the Pericone neck cream and it reaaly works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not sure working as advertised but does make skin nice
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A. Mckinley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Im 57 and it really makes the finer lines disappear. My make up goes on so much better. No grease feel
customer_reviews.author: leigh

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: M.D. Perricone is excellent products. This is a must for chest, neck and shoulders
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: The best in Perricone
customer_reviews.text: Very please with this product, already seeing results, non greasy as well, feels great on skin
customer_reviews.author: BUDDYPAWS

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: I've used this and the face lift product for years. I love what it does for my skin. Although I'm 73, people consistently say I look like I'm in my early 50's, and today at church someone said I looked 35.
customer_reviews.author: D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly. I know it helps me. The scent is not the greatest, but the product works.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorites that was well-priced and delivered in two days.
customer_reviews.author: inthenow

customer_reviews.title: No difference in 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen any difference in my skin and I've been using it for about 3 weeks. I took before pics so I could compare. I'll use it til it's gone but unless I see some improvements I won't be buying again. It's expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Michel

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'd hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Who knows? Probably won't buy this again as it's expensive and other products would probably work as well.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: it does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.text: I use Sub-D not only on my neck (front and back) but I also use it on my face. It does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Old age chin
customer_reviews.text: The Sub D is just starting to work and I like how well it is working - worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hula Girl Judy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.text: At first it seemed as this cream was working: it did soften my skin, but after about a week, I broke out in a rash on my chest. I continued to use it on my neck and chin areaaa only, bu..t my neck area is very sensitive and it made it red and dry looking. I now only use it on my chin area, just to finish the pro.duct. It's not worth the money. Atleast for that amount it should have pleasant odor
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this product 5 stars because I felt it worked, but it made me itch.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love that.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you'd buy in expensive stores, just save some money! Gotta love that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expected to see better results.
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of the item, I expected to see better results.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I can't really tell a difference.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a couple of months and I really can't see any difference, but someone else may have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perricone MD Cold Plasma works
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product about a month ago along with the moisturizer and the no makeup in the same. I get so many compliments on how beautiful my skin looks. My friends think I did something more extreme. This product works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! This is my second jar. It works for me.
customer_reviews.author: SorrelliDiva

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Really worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Really worked for me! Anyone with saggy neck issues should try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Patti D

customer_reviews.title: Another Atta Boy for Dr. Perricone
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years and love it. The larger size is well worth buying as it's much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Neck On The Way!
customer_reviews.text: With good results from other Perricone products, it was not hard to expect high performance from this one but results are obvious.
customer_reviews.author: J C Lowe, MD

customer_reviews.title: Disappearing Sag
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product is helping my "saggy" neck. I have purchased this product from Perricone and ULTA. Much more reasonable pricing here. This cream has an unusual odor but you get use to it and it doesn't linger after application. Thank you....
customer_reviews.author: cindy arrendale

customer_reviews.title: It does work, give it a little time and ...
customer_reviews.text: It does work, give it a little time and you will see a difference. I will buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Rose Rauhauser

customer_reviews.title: Cold Plasma Sub-D is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Rely on this great product to slow down sagging of the jowel area. Works well. I really only love the Cold Plasma Sub-D. Now harder to find
customer_reviews.author: S. Rorke-Davis
